welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bethlehem, where the historic charm of our city awaits you. Known for its stunning architecture and rich history, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that Bethlehem has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lehigh Valley International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Air Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The air cargo terminal at Lehigh Valley International Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Upper Bucks Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Upper Bucks Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Doylestown Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
